## false negative

<dfn>When a test concludes there is no effect when there really is an effect</dfn>

Also called a [type II error](t.html#type-ii-error), but we prefer the more descriptive "false negative".

See also [true positive](t.html#true-positive), [true negative](t.html#true-negative), [false positive](f.html#false-positive)/[type I error](t.html#type-i-error), and [beta](b.html#beta).
